home.WelcomeMsg: Put 5 in a row to win!
home.Instruction: Only Five is a Haitian twist on the classic strategy game, Gomoku. Players take turns placing their pieces on the intersections of a grid. Unlike traditional Gomoku, the objective in Only Five is to connect just five pieces in a row, not six or seven, to win. Enjoy the game solo or challenge a friend, as the first player to connect five pieces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, wins. Put your thinking skills to the test with Only Five.
